pages.text: Many have tried to harness, or at the very least understand, the nature and powers of the things which lurk beyond the Threshold, namely the Great Old Ones. The Great Old Ones are known to associate with mortals for reasons unknown. $(br)Quickly, it became apparent that these unknown powers hold the key to greater insight.

So it happens that some dare to take the first steps towards the aether. Those individuals are known as “Entheators”, $(o)$(t:It should be noted that those who oppose and simply fear Entheators often refer to them as “cultists” or similar.)those of divine, or rather profane, inspiration$().$(br2)For this eternal journey we all attend, $(o)we$() will detail the knowledge essential to each of us in this Great Work.
